item.description:
As much as we all love Karaoke ("Empty Orchestra"), singing with a live band is the ultimate experience!

Lansdowne Pub now offers "Live Band Karaoke" -- the chance to get up and let loose with a live band backing you. It is at once even more of a challenge, and even more of a thrill.

The music starts at 10, and there is no cover charge. For those who want to come early for Karaoke-Do warm-up in our own private space (stretching, breathing, vocalization, visualization), an early peek at the song list, and appetizers courtesy of Lansdowne Pub, please join us at 9pm (we will start on time.)

Rock on!

Shihan Scott A.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the door -- we will have a private space to start.

group.name: Karaoke-Do: Personal Growth through Public Exposureâ„¢

item.name: The "Black Belt" Experience! "Live Band Karaoke" at Lansdowne Pub, Boston!
